front.title: Re-INVITE Handling in the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)

abstract.t: In this document, we clarify the handling of re-INVITEs in SIP. Weclarify in which situations a UAS (User Agent Server) should generatea success response and in which situations a UAS should generate anerror response to a re-INVITE. Additionally, we clarify issuesrelated to target refresh requests.
